00034  // Some of this code may have elements taken from other code without attribution.
00035  // If this is the case it was due to oversight while debugging and I apologize.

00038 
00039 #define RING_INIT_C
00040 
00041 #include <stdbool.h>
00042 #include <stdlib.h>
00043 #include "ring.h"
00044 
00045 bool ring_init(ring_t *r, ring_buffer_t buffer, ring_size_t size)
00046 {
00047     bool success = false;
00048     bool clear;
00049     if (size >= 2 && r != NULL && buffer != NULL)
00050     {
00051         r->buffer = buffer;     // Set index pointers
00052         r->size = size;
00053         clear = ring_clear(r);  // Call ring_clear function
00054         if(clear)
00055         {
00056                 success = true;
00057         }
00058     }
00059     return(success);
00060 }
